jobs.name: Mogu
duties: I worked as a programmer designer where I developed multiple games for different clients and developers.
Developed scalable and reusable systems using OOP principles in Unreal Engine 5 with C++ and Unity C#.
Collaborated with different teams of people to plan, design and implement core game features and mechanics.
Delivered functional gameplay mechanics and new features under tight deadlines.

jobs.name: GCC
duties: Collaborated with the HR team to improve internal IT tools.
Integrated SAP SuccessFactors tool upgrades for better management and user experience.
Assisted in the implementation of Single Sign On integration.
Worked with different teams to improve the workflow of digital processes.

jobs.name: Siete
duties: Implemented an internal system to address high employee turnover, enabling centralized storage of relevant employee information and maintaining historical records.
Migrated employee data from paper-based files to a digital platform, adopting a more modern organizational culture.
Developed an internal CRUD application for employee tracking and administration.
Performed structured cabling installation, as well as administration and support of IT equipment.

projects.name: NoLimits
projects.description: Web application for a local calisthenics gym, developed using technologies like React, Vite and Typescript for the front end and Django, Python and PostgreSQL for the backend and database.
duties: Streamlined onboarding and reduced admin workload with membership management features.
Improved user experience with workout routines and class scheduling.
Provided trainers with useful data by measuring members progress with user personal record tracking and report generation.

projects.name: Codex: Eternal Eclipse
projects.description: Small JRPG game created using Unreal Engine 5, C++ programming language and UE powerful features like Blueprints, behaviour trees, and widgets.
duties: Using OOP and SOLID principles, I designed and implemented core gameplay systems that are scalable and mantainable.
Created different gameplay systems and mechanics like turn based oombat, player inventory, quests and dialogue.
Developed interesting and fun UI elements for interacting with the combat system and inventory menus.

projects.name: Matanga VR Experience
projects.description: Small showcase Virtual Reality game created for the attendees of the Matanga Market using Unreal Engine 5 C++ programming language and UE powerful features like Blueprints and Sequencer.
duties: Created a short but engaging gameplay loop for visitors to try out Virtual Reality technology and win prizes.

projects.name: FinRep
projects.description: Web and mobile application for creating financial reports, developed using Flutter and Dart for the frontend and Django, Python and Azure for the backend and database
duties: Streamlined business processes by generating reports automatically.
